shortDesc:
A cozy room with armchairs and lamps and bookshelves lining the walls.
There is a hardwood door with gold markings to the east, and brass doors to the north.
longDesc:
Giant, towering bookshelves line the walls in this room and you spot a fireplace at the west wall.
Armchairs and lamps are placed in groups around the room for readers to enjoy. There is a cozy cabin ambience to the room. A folded ladder lays upon one of the bookshelves
 To the east is a fancy hardwood door with golden markings etched on the surface. Behind you to the north is the hallway to the art gallery.
smell: You smell a very nice earthy aroma from the burning fireplace. It reminds you of a cabin
sound: The sound of the crackling fireplace lends the whole room a comfortable vibe
